==== lateBoundClassMemberAssignmentJS.js (4 errors) ====
    const _sym = Symbol("_sym");
                 ~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Symbol'.
    export class MyClass {
        constructor() {
            this[_sym] = "ok";
            ~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS7053: Element implicitly has an 'any' type because expression of type 'error' can't be used to index type 'MyClass'.
        }

            this[_sym] = "yep";
            ~~~~~~~~~~
